title: Hack4Change 2026 | Build Technology That Gets Deployed

seo.description: Join Hack4Change 2026 - A three-day hackathon in Moncton, NB addressing homelessness through technology. Build solutions that actually get deployed. March 13-15, 2026 at Venn Innovation.
seo.keywords: hackathon, Moncton, technology, homelessness, civic tech, 2026, New Brunswick, coding competition
